name: Shorturl to random url
author: Md. Sarwar-A-Kawsar

sections.description:
If you need a short url of a set of plugin and if anyone visit to that url then you need to send theme to random url then this is the plugin you are finding for.

You will be able to import CSV file with a url and priority and after importing it will give you a shorturl.

The following companies are using this plugin:
Affordable Pet Care
SEO Ahmedabad

If you need any custom plugin please feel free to contact for further disscussion.
Fiverr profile link

Regards
sections.installation: Just install the plugin you will get a admin menu called “URL shorter” here you will be able to import csv file. CSV file format should be First column url and second column priority value (must be numaric)
